attributes.action: Petition to evoke article 50 of Lisbon treaty
attributes.additional_details: If people of this country don't force the government to evoke article 50 of the Lisbon treaty, then parliament can clearly ignore the result of the referendum on the 23 June 2016.
attributes.background:
Enlight to the up and coming referendum on the 23 June, we the public want to evoke article 50 of the Lisbon treaty and bring the government to account, so they can't ignore the public's decision for a brexit of the U.K. From the EU. 

Acticle 50 of the Lisbon treaty informs the EU in Brussels.
